channel.title: 2 Questions - Npc Teleporting - Help on quest bar
channel.description:
FIRST QUESTION How can I make an npc teleport me places. If i were to click the npc it would give me 4 choices of where i would want to go. How can i do this?
SECOND QUESTION I want to add a "Help" button on the quest bar so when i click help, a interface will pop up and tell you all the info you need on the server.
EDIT For the firts question, it could be for a object aswell, thanks

item.title: 2 Questions - Npc Teleporting - Help on quest bar
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

if(npcID == 0) { // djdoyle1 thanks for help NpcDialogue = 0; case 0: sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460); sendFrame126("Edgeville", 2461); sendFrame126("PK", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;
Search if (NpcDialogue == 1 before the first NPC add:

NpcDialogue == 0 ||

look 4 case 9157:
Add this near the others…

else if (NpcDialogue == 0) { // Hans
							NpcDialogue = 0;
							NpcDialogueSend = false;
							teleportToX = 1234; // Add your X here
							teleportToY = 1234; // Add Y here
						}

Now search case 9158:
Again near the others

 else if (NpcDialogue == 0) { // Hans
                     NpcDialogue = 0;
		     NpcDialogueSend = false;
		     teleportToX = 1234; // Add your X here
		     teleportToY = 1234; // Add Y here
}

Enjoy!

By the way it took me hald an hour to code this ^^

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions - Npc Teleporting - Help on quest bar
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

[quote=“djdoyle1, post:2, topic:317778”]if(npcID == 0) { /* Welcome hans */ absX = 0000; // X absY = 0000; // Y }

Second :
showInterface(codehere);[/quote]

Thanks,

and on the first question, i want to have like Slayer Tower Edge Pk ect, not just on teleport[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2009, 11:53:34 am[/size][hr] changeText126("@or1@KBD Help", 7336);

ClearFrame8134(); changeText126("@dre@King Black Dragon", 8144); changeText126("@dbl@King Black Dragon is in the same spot", 8148); changeText126("@dbl@As in real RuneScape (Wilderness level 42)", 8150); changeText126("@dbl@The drops are:", 8151); changeText126("@dbl@Bandos Godsword: 3%, Bandos Tassets: 5%", 8152); changeText126("@dbl@Bandos Chestplate: 5%, Armadyl Godsword: 3%", 8153); changeText126("@dbl@Armadyl Helmet: 5%, Armadyl Chestplate: 5%", 8155); changeText126("@dbl@Armadyl Skirt: 5%", 8156); changeText126("@dbl@", 8157); changeText126("@dbl@", 8159); changeText126("@dbl@", 8160); changeText126("@dbl@", 8162); changeText126("@dbl@", 8163); changeText126("@dbl@", 8164); changeText126("@dbl@", 8165); changeText126("@dbl@", 8166); changeText126("@dbl@", 8167); changeText126("@dbl@", 8168); changeText126("@dbl@", 8169); changeText126("@dbl@", 8170); changeText126("@dbl@", 8172); changeText126("@dbl@", 8173); showInterface(8134); }

The first code is what you click, then the second code is what pops up, i see no resemblance,
